title: Add crackers burst, improve letter contrast, add kiss pattern, fix butterfly rendering

requirements.text: Add a crackers burst animation effect that plays at an appropriate moment in the experience (e.g., during intro or transition)
acceptanceCriteria: Crackers burst animation is visible and plays at least once
Animation timing fits naturally within the existing flow
Visual effect is celebratory and matches the romantic theme

requirements.text: Ensure letter text has sufficient contrast against the background so it is not camouflaged and remains clearly readable

quotes: the letters must not be camouflaged in background

acceptanceCriteria: Letter text is clearly visible against pink gradient background
Text remains legible throughout all animations

requirements.text: Fill the letter area with kiss graphics as a background pattern that does not obscure or hide the text content

quotes: the letter must be filled with kisses that is in the background and does not hide words

acceptanceCriteria: Kiss graphics appear as a subtle background pattern within the letter area
All letter text remains fully readable over the kiss pattern
Kiss graphics enhance rather than compete with the text

requirements.text: Fix butterfly rendering so they display as proper butterfly shapes instead of boxes

quotes: the butterflies must not be boxes

acceptanceCriteria: Butterflies render as recognizable butterfly shapes
No box-like artifacts or placeholder shapes appear
Butterfly images load correctly and display smoothly

constraints: Do not change the backend implementation
Preserve existing music controls and interactive question flow
Keep the romantic birthday microsite theme intact
nonGoals: Changing the overall color scheme from pink
Modifying the core question/answer flow logic
Adding new interactive features beyond requested fixes

required: Decorative kiss mark icon in romantic style suitable for pattern background (kiss-mark.dim_64x64.png)
